body.name: Vmini Water Bottle with New Wide Handle Straw Lid, Wide Mouth Vacuum Insulated 18/8 Stainless Steel, 32 oz, Gradient Mint + Pink + Purple
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 59 mins
features: 【Vacuum Insulated】 With double-walled vacuum insulation, Vmini Water Bottle (wide mouth) can keep beverages cold for 24 hours, and hot for 8 hours. Perfect for outdoors activities, like camping, driving, beach and so on.

【18/8 Stainless Steel】 Vmini Water Bottle (wide mouth) is made from premium high grade 18/8 stainless steel, which is fully resistant to oxidation and corrosion. More durable, and suitable for adults and children.

【Product Feature】 32oz ( 946ml ), frosted matte powder coat with various colors. Comes with 1 straw lid, 2 straws and 1 straw brush. Vmini Water Bottle has more sizes, colors, and various accessories.

【New Straw Lid】 Patent Design. New straw lid with wide rotating handle makes drinking easier and more convenient. This universal lid is also compatible with Hydro Flask, Simple Modern, Takeya, HYDRO CELL and more.
【Reliable Use】 Vmini Water Bottle and replacement lids are leak-proof and sweat-proof. All materials in contact with beverages are BPA-free, food-safe and recyclable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vmini Double Wall Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Water Bottle (32 oz) Capacity 12/18/24/32/40/64 oz Package content 1 bottle + 1 straw lid + 2 straws + 1 straw brush Material 18/8 stainless steel / plastic / silicone Thermal insulation effect Keep cold for 24 hours and hot for 8 hours

18/8 Stainless Steel Vmini water bottles are made of high quality stainless steel material, which is sturdy and durable. Rather than plastic bottle, double wall stainless steel bottle provide pure taste with no flavor transfer. All Vmini bottles are rust resistant and toxin-free. Vacuum Insulated With vacuum insulated technology, Vmini water bottles can keep beverages cold for 24 hours (1/4 ice) and hot for 8 hours (boiled water). Different environment, beverages, initial temperature and other factors will affect the actual insulation effect. Product Feature Vmini standard mouth double wall stainless steel vacuum insulated water bottle, 32 oz ( 946ml ), covering frosted matte powder coat (sweat-proof and anti-skid), various single and ombre colors, can be matched with different Vmini accessories. Straw Lid Vmini wide mouth straw lid has improved design: 3-finger wide rotating handle, which is more comfortable to carry. Vmini lid is made of high quality plastic materials. This straw lid also fits other wide mouth bottles. Material Temp Lock Details Lid

ALWAYS WITH YOU What makes going to the beach in summer and outdoor skiing in winter better? Take your Vmini, which can keep beverages cold and warm. TO BE BETTER Vmini is committed to designing more unique products and enriching product types. Vmini not only pursues better product appearance, but also more humanized product function. VMINI STYLE "Me We Vmini" - Each of us has our own lifestyle and attitude. Drink coffee peacefully alone with Vmini, or share your favorite wine with friends with Vmini. INDIVIDUAL CHARACTER Gym is not only a place to exercise, but also a new social place for fitness enthusiasts. Your sports water bottle can show your preference and personality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift. Colors are great, nice it came with extra straw and a cleaning brush. Keeps everything cold for hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 Hours in the Sun, Drinks Still Cold!
reviews.reviewText: I've been through a lot of water bottles that I stop using pretty quickly. They don't keep temperature at all, and I get bored of the flavor of room temperature water too quickly. I figured it was time for a real water bottle that can keep my drinks cold and refreshing. I was skeptical when I found this product, because it's such an affordable price, but I bought it based on reviews. I'm so glad I did, because I finally found the only water bottle I'll ever need.Unlike most drinkware brands, this one actually DOES keep drinks cold, and for a long time, too! I'm a delivery driver, and kept it in my car with me this summer while working. Even after 10 hours of sitting in my car in the hot sun, my drink would still be just about as ice cold as when I'd left the house! The bottle itself would get pretty hot, and yet the drink inside still had ice and everything. I couldn't believe how well this thing works!I know there are some complaints about leaking in some reviews. I haven't experienced any leaks. I never have to screw the cap on tightly at all, and it seals great. If the bottle is lying down on my seat, I do notice there will be a little condensation around the closed spout on the lid, but it has never leaked. I think keeping this bottle just for cold drinks will help it last longer and prevent any issues (but if you like hot drinks, there are so many colors to choose from, why not buy one color for cold and one for hot?) Also, since it can get pretty heavy when filled, I try to avoid using the carrying handle. I suspect the strain of using it might weaken the seal inside the cap. It also seems like it might break over time if used too much. I would recommend buying a carrying strap instead to best protect your nice bottle.My sticker didn't adhere to the bottle at first, and kept trying to peel off, but once I left my bottle in the hot sun, the sticker stayed permanently. So if you have any issues decorating your bottle, just warm it up in the sun, first!I love the two straws, so you can swap them out for easy cleaning, and it even came with a straw brush! I'm so glad it came with the extra goodies, it makes it so easy to swap out for a fresh straw (especially at a time where we should be very cautious of germs). The mouthpiece is a hard plastic, but covered in a rubbery coating, so you won't bust your teeth on it, which is a cool detail. The flip-top straw works really well and has never given me issues, unlike past water bottles.This one fits inside the big cupholder of my Mustang, but it doesn't fit in my Mazda's cupholders. But with a large water bottle, it's gotta be expected. Like I said, I've never had any issues with it leaking while lying in the seat all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water bottle
reviews.reviewText: This is a great water bottle. It holds ice for 24-48 hours, it doesn't leak, keeps water cold without ice, is easy to drink from and carry around. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this thing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a big old Nalgene bottle I had for years. I’m trying to get rid of as much plastic storage for food and drinks as possible, and as someone who sips on ice water all day, this was a big one for me.I wish I’d done this years ago! It stays cold enough that I still have a little ice left at 9pm, after starting to use it at 7am. I don’t have an ice dispenser, so I just fill it 2/3 of the way with water and leave it in the freezer overnight. Works beautifully. Really pretty color, too!I’ll be buying a second one at some point, just to be able to alternate. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not entirely leak-proof
reviews.reviewText: I love the colors and the look of this bottle. This was my second one! I love the straw, color, size, and the fact that it comes with cleaning brushes. The cons I will note that I close the bottle tight and make sure that when I flip it it does not leak, however, I realized that when it gets turned on its side in my tote bag it does leak a lot and get my bag all wet. It actually ruined one of my books :/ I'm not sure how it keeps happening because I do make sure it's closed tight- maybe from the straw opening? Otherwise, it is durable and very cute. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a well-insulated bottle that both looks good and is essentially LEAKPROOF.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This water bottle is AMAZING! The colors are very vibrant and the design of the lid is both functional and sleek looking. The handle makes it easy to carry, though I did take one star off of the “easy to hold” category because the 32oz bottle is too wide for my car’s cup holders.As you can see from my video, if the spout is in the “closed” position, the bottle doesn’t leak at all. This was such a positive for me, since my previous water bottles have all leaked. I have also had issues with other bottles (*cough cough* Camelbak) shooting water out of the spout/straw when screwing the lid on or when the bottle has been sitting in a hot car for a little while. As you all know, getting splashed in the face when trying to take a sip of water is just...SO fun. So far I have not experienced that with this VMini bottle.In addition to being essentially leak proof, this bottle is extremely well insulated. Right now it’s 11am and I’m drinking ice water that I put in this bottle last night at 9pm. The ice has melted but the water is still EXTREMELY cold. I could easily see this bottle keeping ice water cold for 24 hours as it’s been 14 hours so far and the temperature of the water hasn’t changed much at all.As far as wear and tear, I can’t attest to durability over time as I’ve only had it a few days, but so far I have dropped it a few times and there’s not so much as a ding or chip on the bottle. I’m VERY clumsy so that’s a huge plus for me!In summary, if you are looking for a new water bottle and are worried about spending more than 20 bucks on this one, I want to reassure you that it is WELL worth it. I’m so glad I made this purchase!

Keeps cold drinks really cold, wide mouth great to add ice, love the extra straw and brush to clean the straw. Bought my husband one too. Nice thing is the outside coating - easy to hold even when you have sweaty hands. Love the Nectarine colour and got the Ice Floe for my husband. Well worth the money, and I got them on a timed deal - even better! No leaks, and I really like the handle which is nice and big for my arthritic hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have a smaller version and can drink through it quite quickly, so bigger is always better. 😉

reviews.reviewTitle: 可愛くて毎日使いたい

reviews.reviewText: Keeps cold for hours. Doesn't leak. Great size. Comfortable mouth piece. Love it!

Excellent water bottle. Has a soft rubber mouth piece. Plastic straw so you don’t get that metal taste. Leakproof and keeps your water cold. Haven’t tried the hot option yet, but I highly recommend the bottle. Will definitely buy again & I love the hot pink & yellow combo :)
